release.description: A simple single-user application to keep track of your current food items you have.
release.action: Basic management of food items. (CRUD)
Provide support for easy entry of recurring items.
Notify user if an item is near to exceed its "best before end" date.
Data can be loaded and saved persistently.
Management of ongoing food usage. (So you know exactly how much of each item you have got).
Basic budget functionality.
Management of "who has bought what and who has to pay for what".
Persistent saving to arbitrary FTP server (Multi-computer support).

release.description: An application that manages the issues arrising in households with multiple persons. (especially communities)
release.action: Management of household jobs (toilet cleaning, shopping).
Management of meals (Recurring combined usage of items).
Database support.
Management of meals (Recurring combined usage of items).
Convert to a J2EE application.
Web user interface.
Provide mulitiple household support (this would enable a student's portal website to offer housekeeper as a service).
Fetch meals from the Internet.
Fetch lists of food items from the stores.
Electronic shopping lists for cell phones.
Use cell phone's camera for capturing barcodes for automatic item management.
Cell phone based access application.
